snippet: Financial misdoings have emerged at the renowned French educational institute, Sciences Po, after the death of its director, and now the government is likely to seek tighter control.
abstract: Financial scandal has arisen at renowned French educational institute Sciences Po, known formally as Institut d'Etudes Politiques de Paris, after death of director Richard Descoings; government audit has shown that Descoings used public funds to pay for raise for himself and vaguely justified payouts to many others.

byline.contributor: Maïa de la Baume contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Financial misdoings have emerged at the renowned French educational institute, Sciences Po, after the death of its director, and now the government is likely to seek tighter control.

headline.seo: Sciences Po’s Future Cloudy After Leader’s Death
headline.main: Paris University Scandal Clouds Esteemed Past
headline.print_headline: Paris University Scandal Clouds Esteemed Past
